html:
SALES ORDER

{{ doc.name }}

{% if doc.status == "Draft" -%}

{{ doc.status }}

{%- endif %}
Customer Name: {{ doc.customer_name }} Date: {{ doc.get_formatted('transaction_date') }}
Address: {% if doc.address_display != None -%} {{ doc.address_display }} {%- endif %} Delivery Date: {{ doc.get_formatted('delivery_date') }}
Contact: {% if doc.contact_display != None -%} {{ doc.contact_display }} {%- endif %} Phone {% if doc.contact_phone != None -%} {{ doc.contact_phone }} {%- endif %}
CNIC: {% if doc.cnic != None -%} {{ doc.cnic }} {%- endif %} NTN: {% if doc.ntn != None -%} {{ doc.ntn }} {%- endif %}
STRN {% if doc.strn != None -%} {{ doc.strn }} {%- endif %}
{%- for item in doc.items -%} {%- endfor -%}
Sr Description Quantity Rate Amount
{{ loop.index }} {% if item.image != '' -%}
{%- endif %}
{{ item.item_code }} {% if item.design_name != None -%}
Design Name: {{ item.design_name }} {%- endif %} {% if item.fabric_gsm != None -%}
Fabric GSM: {{ item.fabric_gsm }} {%- endif %} {% if item.fabric_width != None -%}
Fabric Width: {{ item.fabric_width }} {%- endif %} {% if item.fabric_material != None -%}
Fabric Material: {{ item.fabric_material }} {%- endif %} {% if item.fabric_wastage != None -%}
Fabric Wastage: {{ item.fabric_wastage }} % {%- endif %} {% if item.fabric_source != None -%}
Fabric Source: {{ item.fabric_source }} {%- endif %} {% if item.design_width != None -%}
Design Width: {{ item.design_width }} {%- endif %} {% if item.design_height != None -%}
Design Height: {{ item.design_height }} {%- endif %} {% if item.design_gap != None -%}
Design Gap: {{ item.design_gap }} {%- endif %} {% if item.design_uom != None -%}
Design UOM: {{ item.design_uom }} {%- endif %}
{{ item.uom }} {{ item.qty }} {{ item.get_formatted("rate") }} {{ item.get_formatted("amount") }}
{%- for tax in doc.taxes -%} {% set account = tax.account_head.split('-') %} {%- endfor -%}
Total Quantity {{ doc.total_qty }} Total {{ '{:0,.2f}'.format(doc.total) }}
{{ account[0] }} @ {{ tax.rate }}% {{ tax.get_formatted("tax_amount") }}
Rounded Total {{ doc.get_formatted("base_rounded_total") }}
In Words : {{ frappe.utils.money_in_words(doc.rounded_total) }}
name: duraprints Sale Order

html:
SALES ORDER

{{ doc.name }}

Customer Name: {{ doc.customer_name }}
Delivery Date: {{ doc.get_formatted('delivery_date') }}
Date: {{ doc.get_formatted('transaction_date') }}
{%- for item in doc.items -%} {% if item.uom != item.stock_uom -%} {%- else %} {%- endif %} {%- endfor -%}
Sr Description Quantity
{{ loop.index }} {% if item.image != '' -%}
{%- endif %} {{ item.item_code }}
Fabric GSM: {{ item.fabric_gsm }}
Fabric Width: {{ item.fabric_width }} 		{{ item.stock_uom }} {{ '{:0,.2f}'.format(item.stock_qty) }} {{ item.uom }} {{ item.qty }} {{ item.uom }} {{ item.qty }}
Total Quantity {{ doc.total_qty }}
name: Print for work order
